channel.title: Service on Boy Scouts Troop 201
channel.description: Recent content in Service on Boy Scouts Troop 201

item.title: Scouting for Food Coordinator
item.description: Duties Coordinate with Vista Del Camino for pickup. Ensure that troop youth leaders have maps of collection area. Ensure that flyers are prepared and ready for handout Coordinate the pickup and delivery of collected food. Position History Keri Cavanaugh 2016-2021 Sean Bridges 2016-2020
